title: Ex-MCC president fined for discriminatory comments
byline: Former Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) president Phillip Hodson has been fined for offensive and discriminatory comments he made at an after-dinner speech when he was deputy chair at Yorkshire.

title: Curran hat-trick stifles Sri Lanka in strong T20WC audition
byline: Sam Curran was thrilled to claim a rare hat-trick as England registered a win over Sri Lanka just days out from the start of the T20 World Cup.
